title: On three several hurricanes of the American seas and their relations to the Northers, so called, of the Gulf of Mexico and the Bay of Honduras, with charts illustrating the same
author: W. C. Redfield
journal: American Journal of Science and Arts
note: vol 51 nos 1–3 = ser 2 vol 1 nos 1–3 [May 1846] / vol 52 nos 4–6 = ser 2 vol 2 nos 4–6 [Nov 1846]
